remarks: Define the function operation map.  The definition is designed so that if ` R ` is a binary operation, then ` oF R ` is the analogous operation on functions which corresponds to applying ` R ` pointwise to the values of the functions.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 20-Jul-2014.)
